User-agent: *
Allow: /
Sitemap: https://markdowntolinkedin.com/sitemap.xml

# Allow all search engines
User-agent: Googlebot
Allow: /

User-agent: Bingbot
Allow: /

User-agent: Slurp
Allow: /

User-agent: DuckDuckBot
Allow: /

# Block bad bots
User-agent: AhrefsBot
Disallow: /

User-agent: SemrushBot
Disallow: /

User-agent: MJ12bot
Disallow: /

User-agent: DotBot
Disallow: /

# Crawl delay for responsible crawling
Crawl-delay: 1
